projects.description: This project involved using regex to create an interactive form, that changes depending on what you select. Now I should stop talking, so you can try it for yourself!
This project, although beautiful, is created simply with plain javascript. The gallery is interactive to keywords relating to the photos. Go on, try it out!
This project is object-oriented program, using constructors and methods. Please demo this to see for yourself!

We cannot forget the basics. To demonstrate my skills in FEWD, the project is mobile responsive. I would like to highlight, I used CSS to create a beautiful rainbow backgrounds. One of my earlier work, but still a fine piece of art!
This project pulls data through a public API to create an employee directory, complete with a modal that allows you to flick back and forth the directory!

This program randomly appends quotes to the DOM, as well selecting the appropriate color to match the type of quote. And they say, in nature, light create color. n the picture, color creates the light.
